pullrequest.title: add filters class (split out of pull request #999).

content.raw: A suggestion on improving the performance of `Update()`. We can use a class member variable `sum` to keep track of the sum of elements in the vector then in `Get()`, we can return the result of `sum / valWindowSize`. This saves the cost of looping through potentially a vector of large window size on every update.
content.html: A suggestion on improving the performance of Update(). We can use a class member variable sum to keep track of the sum of elements in the vector then in Get(), we can return the result of sum / valWindowSize. This saves the cost of looping through potentially a vector of large window size on every update.
